amendment.description: To permit a deficit-neutral reserve fund to provide assistance for fishery disasters declared during 2012.

vote.text: Amendment SA 672 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 672 proposed by Senator Murkowski.
